verbs.description: capital region tales of [V: lost] [ARG1: found] rings one ring went missing after a fight the couple quickly calmed down and called in an expert to help find it others were lost for decades even half a century they were gone for good until someone found a ring and set out to find the owner here are some of their stories san juan juan gonzalez tales rensselaer polytechnic institute fedex capital region puerto rico rpi
